text: In this video, I will make the case for paying more attention to Google parent Alphabet (NASDAQ: GOOGL) (NASDAQ: GOOG) despite all the recent OpenAI announcements such as Sora and a possible Google Search competitor. *Stock prices used were from the trading day of Feb. 15, 2024. The video was published on Feb. 16, 2024. Should you invest $1,000 in Alphabet right now?
